special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.description: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
